title: Ally

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Focus on Me (Night): Choose a player. They will be redirected to you tonight.
- Embrace (Night): Choose a player. Any abilities targeting either you or your target will fail. Your target will be roleblocked through immunity.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If using Focus on Me would result in your death, your ability will fail, and you will be notified as to the reason why.
- You may not target an Unseen member with Embrace two nights in a row.
